channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16119] Procedure v2 - Reimplement merge
item.description: use the proc-v2 state machine for merge. also update the logic to have a single meta-writer.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The draft patch could be reviewed in https://reviews.apache.org/r/54012/
